Now <S%H4338>Mesha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was a sheep <S%H5349>breeder;<s%> and he <S%H7725>rendered<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H6785>wool<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>
But it <S%H256>happened,<s%> when Ahab was <S%H4194>dead,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> at that <S%H3117>time,<s%> and <S%H6485>mustered<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against <S%H3212>me.<s%> Will you go with me against <S%H4124>Moab<s%> to <S%H4421>battle?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will go <S%H5927>up.<s%> I am as you <S%H5971>are,<s%> my people as your <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H5483>horses<s%> as your <S%H5483>horses.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Which <S%H1870>way<s%> shall we go <S%H5927>up?<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> "The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>"

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and they made a <S%H5437>circuit<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey.<s%> There was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H4264>army,<s%> nor for the <S%H929>animals<s%> that followed <S%H7272>them.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas!<s%> For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H7121>together<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>"

But <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5030>"Isn't<s%> there here a prophet of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by <S%H259>him?<s%>" One of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559><s%> <S%H477>"Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> is <S%H3332>here,<s%> who poured <S%H4325>water<s%> on the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>"

<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3426>is<s%> with <S%H4428>him.<s%>" So the king of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> went down to <S%H3381>him.<s%>

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "What have I to do with <S%H3212>you?<s%> Go to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of your <S%H517>mother.<s%>" The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "No; for Yahweh has <S%H7121>called<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H7121>together<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>"

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> <S%H3884>surely,<s%> were it not that I <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> I would not <S%H5027>look<s%> toward <S%H7200>you,<s%> nor see you.
But now <S%H3947>bring<s%> me a <S%H5059>minstrel.<s%>" It <S%H5059>happened,<s%> when the minstrel <S%H5059>played,<s%> that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of Yahweh came on <S%H3068>him.<s%>
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Make this <S%H5158>valley<s%> full of <S%H1356>trenches.<s%>'

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'You will not see <S%H7307>wind,<s%> neither will you <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1653>rain;<s%> yet that <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and you will <S%H8354>drink,<s%> both you and your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and your <S%H929>animals.<s%>
This is but a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He will also <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

You shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and every <S%H4004>choice<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and shall <S%H5307>fell<s%> every <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H5640>stop<s%> all <S%H4599>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H3510>mar<s%> every <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2513>piece<s%> of land with <S%H68>stones.<s%>'"

It happened in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> about the time of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the <S%H5927>offering,<s%> that <S%H4325>behold,<s%> water <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H776>country<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is <S%H1818>blood.<s%> The <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H2717>surely<s%> <S%H2717>destroyed,<s%> and they have <S%H2717>struck<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other.<s%> Now <S%H4124>therefore,<s%> Moab, to the <S%H7998>spoil!<s%>"

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> so that they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5221>them;<s%> and they went forward into the land <S%H5221>smiting<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites.<s%>

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was too <S%H2388>severe<s%> for <S%H3947>him,<s%> he took with him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to break <S%H1234>through<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> but they could <S%H3201>not.<s%>
